subject: Re: Small Speakers (portable!)
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Judy,

I have found that they will work if the speakers you purchase are 
amplified.  The earbud jack will not drive unamplified speakers loud 
enough in my opinion, so read the package carefully.  ;)

LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All, Went into my local (Culver City, CA) Longs Drug store and 
saw 2 different types of SONY dual/twin speakers - one was $11.99 
(rectangle in grey) and the other (round ones in white) couldn't find 
out the price! Went to Rite Aid in same area (Mar Visa, CA) and saw 
Phillips brand dual/twin speakers (nice looking round ones in black) 
for $12.99!  I am SOooo tempted to try one of these out for the RS 12-
469 I have!!!  =Judy=   Ideas??
>
